data.text: The Selection Race is tomorrow…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: The Selection Race is tomorrow…

data.text:
I'm sorry for making you wait… 
But just wait… a little longer…
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry for making you wait… 
<story>But just wait… a little longer…

data.text:
I will definitely win tomorrow, then I will have my debut 
race… Then I will dedicate many, many wins to you.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
<story>I will definitely win tomorrow, then I will have my debut 
<story>race… Then I will dedicate many, many wins to you.

data.text: Your big sister will do her best.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>Your big sister will do her best.

data.text: Was it you…?
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: <story>Was it you…?

data.text:
Was it you that wanted to race so badly? Was it you that wanted 
to win so badly? Was it you that had so much fun? And… was it 
you that felt so lonely…?
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed:
<story>Was it you that wanted to race so badly? Was it you that wanted 
<story>to win so badly? Was it you that had so much fun? And… was it 
<story>you that felt so lonely…?

data.text: Was that all you? Hey…
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: <story>Was that all you? Hey…

data.text:
The day of Admire Vega's Selection Race has finally 
arrived. Many trainers were gathered in the audience, 
their eyes full of anticipation.
data.processed:
<story>The day of Admire Vega's Selection Race has finally 
<story>arrived. Many trainers were gathered in the audience, 
<story>their eyes full of anticipation.

data.text: I'm also very excited to see Admire Vega's race…
data.processed: <story>I'm also very excited to see Admire Vega's race…

data.text: I will definitely win.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>I will definitely win.

data.text: After last night, I couldn't help but worry about her.

choices.text: I… have a bad feeling about this.

data.processed: <story>After last night, I couldn't help but worry about her.

data.text: But despite these concerns, the race began without a hitch!
data.processed: <story>But despite these concerns, the race began without a hitch!

data.text: (Woooooh!!)
data.processed: <story>(Woooooh!!)

data.text: Hah, hahh, haa—
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>Hah, hahh, haa—

data.text: I will win… I have to win.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: I will win… I have to win.

data.text:
That time, I later found out that it could have 
been me or her that ended up as the sacrifice.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
<story>That time, I later found out that it could have 
<story>been me or her that ended up as the sacrifice.

data.text:
I lived merely by pure chance. Or perhaps… 
My life was simply a miracle left to me by my little sister.
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed:
<story>I lived merely by pure chance. Or perhaps… 
<story>My life was simply a miracle left to me by my little sister.

data.text: So!
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>So!

data.text:
They are finally rounding the fourth corner and entering 
into the final straight! Number 9 is breaking out from 
the group and taking a great lead. The favorite for 
this race, Admire Vega, is in 5th place!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>They are finally rounding the fourth corner and entering 
<story>into the final straight! Number 9 is breaking out from 
<story>the group and taking a great lead. The favorite for 
<story>this race, Admire Vega, is in 5th place!

data.text: Hahh, haa, guuuh…!
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>Hahh, haa, guuuh…!

data.text:
Admire Vega seems to be surrounded…! 
Did she not manage to get into a good position?
data.name: Average Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Admire Vega seems to be surrounded…! 
<story>Did she not manage to get into a good position?

data.text: No… No! I won't be forgiven for doing anything other than winning!! But, I…!!
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: No… No! I won't be forgiven for doing anything other than winning!! But, I…!!

data.text:
You… really loved running, huh? 
You really wanted to race, and to win, didn't you?
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed:
<story>You… really loved running, huh? 
<story>You really wanted to race, and to win, didn't you?

data.text: Then, if that's the case… I…
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: <story>Then, if that's the case… I…

data.text: I'll grant you your wish.
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: <story>I'll grant you your wish.

data.text: Your big sister… will…!!
data.name: Young Ayabe
data.processed: <story>Your big sister… will…!!

data.text: I will continue running, I will continue winning! And I will continue to bring glory to her!
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: I will continue running, I will continue winning! And I will continue to bring glory to her!

data.text: The only reason. The only reason that I am alive is for this!
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: The only reason. The only reason that I am alive is for this!

data.text: …… Aaaaaaaaahh!!
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>…… Aaaaaaaaahh!!

data.text:
Admire Vega is quickly and nimbly cutting through the pack and 
pushing forward! 3rd place, 2nd place, and 1st place! What 
magnificently explosive power!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Admire Vega is quickly and nimbly cutting through the pack and 
<story>pushing forward! 3rd place, 2nd place, and 1st place! What 
<story>magnificently explosive power!!

data.text: Eh? Wait, what was…
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed: <story>Eh? Wait, what was…

data.text:
And goal!! The winner of this selection 
race is Admire Vega! Admire Vega has won!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And goal!! The winner of this selection 
<story>race is Admire Vega! Admire Vega has won!

data.text:
That terrifying speed that she showed at the end of the final 
straight. The onlookers were so moved by the force of it all that 
they couldn't help but cheer.
data.processed:
<story>That terrifying speed that she showed at the end of the final 
<story>straight. The onlookers were so moved by the force of it all that 
<story>they couldn't help but cheer.

data.text: Then came an unsettling sound.
data.processed: <story>Then came an unsettling sound.

data.text: Haah, haahh, haaaah—
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>Haah, haahh, haaaah—

data.text:
This is an announcement regarding the most recent race. Due to 
her diagonal movement in the final straight, Admire Vega has been 
lowered to 4th place.
data.name: Selection Race Official A
data.processed:
<story>This is an announcement regarding the most recent race. Due to 
<story>her diagonal movement in the final straight, Admire Vega has been 
<story>lowered to 4th place.

data.text: Haa… gh……
data.name: Admire Vega
data.processed: <story>Haa… gh……

data.text:
That day, no trainer reached out to 
Admire Vega and she left the venue, alone.
data.processed:
<story>That day, no trainer reached out to 
<story>Admire Vega and she left the venue, alone.
